snippet: The five-episode series on ESPN, “Inside: US Soccer’s March to Brazil,” will follow the national team as it trains for the World Cup.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column examines ESPN's five-episode series Inside: US Soccer's March to Brazil, which will follow the men's national team as it trains for the World Cup.
lead_paragraph: The five-episode series on ESPN, “Inside: US Soccer’s March to Brazil,” will follow the national team as it trains for the World Cup.
